pr_title: DDB Enhanced client: flattened batch get items

timeline.bodyText: As we discussed we should remove this as there's no use-case for needing it with pagination and flatmapped iteration support.
timeline.author: bmaizels

timeline.message: Make batchGetItem return BatchGetItemResultPageIterable/BatchGetItemResultPagePublisher that allows customers to iterable/publish to flattened results
Make batchGetItem return BatchGetItemResultPageIterable/BatchGetItemResultPagePublisher that allows customers to iterable/publish to flattened results
